= How to compile Sayonara =

== Libraries ==

  * Qt: Gui, Core, Phonon, Xml, Sql http://qt.nokia.com/products/
  * libcurl http://curl.haxx.se/libcurl/
  * libclastfm http://liblastfm.sourceforge.net/
  * Taglib http://developer.kde.org/~wheeler/taglib.html
  * Sqlite


== Linux ==

  * qmake
  * make
  * make install
